version_description:
Enhanced ATM locator
Added FAQ's to support page
Bug fixes

- New Self-Service features: Easily change account information, report cards lost/stolen, and more.
- New quick card switcher for multiple accounts, switch cards on quick balance screen
- New Account tab - manage account settings
- Minor Performance Improvements
- Bug Fixes

Bugfixes:
- Duplicate transactions
- Loading spinner on login
- Sms Notification settings
- ATM Locator

- Bug fixes
- In app card activation

New Stuff!
- New Ingo, automatically takes the photo
- See your balance and transaction history for your closed cards
- Quick Balance is now the default start screen, and refreshes whenever you switch to the app automatically (If Enabled)

Bug Fixes!
- Some generic design fixes, many of which you may not notice but the app looks a tiny bit nicer
- Performance fixes
Bugfixes

- Bugfixes
- Security Fixes
-Bugfixes

New and improved card to card transfers
Bugfixes and security improvments
Fixes a whitescreen issue some phones were having
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes and speed improvements

Welcome to the new CARD.com app!

We've been hard at work over the past few months creating this latest version adding some of the most requested features, fixing bugs, and redesigning the experience. Hope you enjoy!

New Features:
- New, easier to use design
- Fingerprint login
- Better security
- Better performance
- Everything you need to do is within a few taps
Bugfixes
Bugfixes

We updated our card art search tool, so signing up for a new card has never been easier!

There's also some bugfixes. There's always bugfixes.

- Bugfix for maps
- Changed language to say FaceID for iPhone X
- SMS subscription management in app
Bugfixes
This version fixes that pesky issue with FaceID crashing the app. If you're using an iPhone X then this upgrade is for you!
Bugfixes
Fixes a bug with push notifications

- Fixes some nasty bugs on iOS 11
- Consistent language around FaceID vs TouchID
Fixed some pesky bugs
